channel.description: Its not too great, I think it doesnt look too bad. But here it is: http://img171.imageshack.us/my.php?image=weenmj0.png For the reference, Naphta is my name on another forum.

item.title: Strange halo LP
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

If you want it to be spooky, why are you using a Sans font?
Put the cooling effect on the top of the image so it blends in better.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange halo LP
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

[quote=“Zameix, post:2, topic:235323”]Remove the edited by Naphta, other than that it’s looking good. I like the idea, but i’m thinking the text doesn’t fit the image.

If you were to have eye catching font or text effects, and perhaps get rid of the cold feel and give it a more warm feel.[/quote]
I respect your opinion, but cold is the idea, its more of a spooky idea. I will however do a second revision of the text.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange halo LP
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Remove the edited by Naphta, other than that it’s looking good. I like the idea, but i’m thinking the text doesn’t fit the image.

If you were to have eye catching font or text effects, and perhaps get rid of the cold feel and give it a more warm feel.

Read full topic
